name: Dusk Strider
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45 (Jam).

UPDATE: flipped the "loop" setting on the music. 

--
Art by Joe Hanna @JoeHasDiedGames, made in Aseprite

Music and Sound made by Nash High, NashHigh.com, made in Synth-Corona, also by Nash High

Coding: Joe and Nash, in Godot

CONCEPT:
Create platforms as you walk across them and walls as you slide down them. You'll have to use these platforms to jump and walljump through the labyrinth. 

CONTROLS:
WASD or ARROW KEYS to move and jump
Spacebar also Jumps

SPECIAL COMMANDS:
-pressing DOWN or S while in the air creates a platform beneath you.

 -pressing a direction and UP at the same time creates a wall.
